items.title: A Historic Stock Rally Is Running Into the Worst Month of the Year
items.description: The S&P 500 has rebounded 27 percent from its April lows.

items.title: How Fawning Is Bad for Innovation
items.description: It turns out there is such a thing as being too nice.

items.title: The ‘Father of the Cable Modem’ on How He Avoided Disaster and Created a Revolutionary Product
items.description: The quest to build a consumer cable modem was close to ending in failure at a flooding Army facility. Then the CEO got on a plane.

items.title: The Number 1 HR Priority of Inc. 5000 Companies? It Isn’t Recruiting New Employees
items.description: Here’s how the CEOs of the fastest-growing companies in America are managing HR-related issues.

items.title: Your Strategic Plan Is Already Obsolete Thanks to AI. Now What?
items.description: Clinging to old-school planning methods could kill your competitive edge this next year.
